ai-patthana17.32:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.32:0.3_0: Setting on what is connected with what is visible,
ai-patthana17.32:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.32:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.32:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. That is a cause or reason for the sake of this.
ai-patthana17.32:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
